posts.title: How to Optimize Your Dating Profile for Better Matches
posts.description: Simple, actionable tips to make your profile stand out and get more matches.
posts.content:
Improving your dating profile doesn't need to be complicated. Start with clear, well-lit photos, a concise bio that shows personality, and highlight your interests. Use the following checklist to get started:

  • Choose 3-5 high-quality photos showing you in different settings.
  • Keep your bio specific and avoid clichés.
  • Mention activities you enjoy to give people conversation hooks.

Consistent testing and small tweaks can significantly increase match rates over time.

posts.title: Photo Tips That Actually Work
posts.description: How to pick and edit photos that improve your chances.
posts.content:
Photos are the first thing people notice. Here are practical tips:

  1. Use natural light whenever possible.
  2. Show your face clearly—avoid large sunglasses in your main photo.
  3. Include at least one photo of you doing an activity you love.

Try A/B testing different photos to see what works best.
